TopicTitle: Modding Q&A and Solving "MOAR" Questions and Problems: A Quest to Help Fellow Modders

Articles.Content:
I've had lots of trouble ever getting answers, or even feedback, whenever I post a thread questioning some sort of problem I've been having with my addons and mods, and even plugins, and I feel completely disregarded. I'll see that my thread is a "hot thread," even though it doesn't have one reply! I'm sure many other people have noticed things like this, so I'll try to do my part, but as much as I can, not just until I feel a bit lazy!

So, here are threads that we can also learn from, kinda like Hoojiwana's (did I spell that right?) modding link compilation.

(Thanks to him for inspiring me in a way! )

Here are all of the helped threads I've noted as of now:

Solar particle collectors?

Part.CFG Curves

Generally speaking, "making your first part"

Launch smoke parts (somewhat of a request)

I'm, in no way, attempting an sort of backseat moderation; just trying to make the Forums a better place, especially around the modding affairs forum secions.

Well, if you helped any and you want to share, or ones that need help, please do. Post them in big packages, and then I'll put them up here.

Also, if you need help, let's have this like a Q&A thread and question thread referral thread.

So, feel free to discuss right now, and if not me, I'm sure someone else can help you!

Edited February 2, 2014 by Naten
I think your sentences are being replaced with Smileys on my monitor

Now is it any better? :/

I can't tell if that's sarcasm or seriousness... :c

So, anyways, so much helping already, everyone! Just look around, and find a thread to answer if you have a spare minute or two! Just a little encouragement will help a lot, too. Just try, and as I said, make the KSP Forums a better place!
